attributes.action: provide safe haven respite care for families whose members have a disability and/or war - related injuries
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Redditch case shows how difficult life for families can be when one of their members has a disability and they may feel isolated. Further to the petitioner's earlier request for "baby hatch" depositories for unwanted newborns, I am calling for safe haven type - hostels funded by local authorities where families can receive respite care for their disabled relatives - when so many more people are returning from battle, this idea may be even more poignant.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
